analysis.description: ECRecovery.recover (/unique_chucks/32/0xb2f71443bbdf67d35a3e6915121c118200e5b15b.sol#319-354) is declared view but contains assembly code

PrivateToken.isDepositAllowed (/unique_chucks/32/0xb2f71443bbdf67d35a3e6915121c118200e5b15b.sol#389-397) uses timestamp for comparisons
